chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue:

Hello,
I received an iPhone 12 ordered in PERFECT CONDITION. However, it's not the case for several reasons:
- It has scratches on the frame that are visible within 20 cm.
- The front speaker is sunken.
- The rear objectives have a very thick border that is not typical of iPhones.
You can find photos attached to illustrate my claims.
Finally, the charging cable that was supposed to be included is missing.
What can you do for me?
Best regards,
VIOLLEAU Marie

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile


The customer wrote: "I received an iPhone 12 ordered in PERFECT CONDITION. However this is not the case for several reasons:
- It has chips on the contour that are visible at less than 20 cm.
- The front speaker is recessed.
- The rear lenses have a very thick contour that is not that of iPhones.
Photos are attached to illustrate my point.
Finally, the charging cable that was supposed to come with it is missing.
What can you do for me?


Regards,
Affoue-Clotilde-Sonia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Please relay the message to the customer that we are sorry that the customer is unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 30 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.  Do let me know if the customer accepts this gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello Marie,
You will find the prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will take care of your return. Choose the location that best suits you to send your package. You'll find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/
Return preparation:
1. See instructions for returning an item <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Add all the accessories provided with your item
3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector
4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below.
Packaging the article:
• The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so it is stable and does not move during transport.
• Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outside label gets damaged.
• Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending. This will protect you in case of a problem during transport.
Your return is ready to be sent! We'll let you know when it arrives.
We remain at your service,
Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Josue Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
